abstract: Our Summer Reading Contest is in its third week. To participate, just post a comment here by 7 a.m. Eastern on July 3 and answer the question, “What interested you most in The Times this week?”

headline.main: Summer Reading Contest, Week 3 | What Interested You Most in The Times This Week?
